channel.title: Missing Features

item.title: Missing Features
item.dc:creator: @starhooper starhooper
item.description:
@starhooper wrote:

One. players and npc messages beening shown when in npc chat.

[code] public void addMessageNpc(ChatMessage msg) {
List playersInView = viewArea.getPlayersInView();
for (Player p : playersInView) {
p.informOfNpcMessage(msg);
}
}

public void addMessagePlayer(ChatMessage msg) {
	List<Player> playersInView = viewArea.getPlayersInView();
	for (Player p : playersInView) {
		p.informOfChatMessage(msg);
	}
}[/code]

I do not see why yours couldnâ€™t of did that ages ago

Will be adding more missing features when i get bored but that was a simple one.
